text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

translation.en: But those who disbelieve and deny Our signs - those are the companions of Hellfire
translation.id: Adapun orang-orang yang kafir dan mendustakan ayat-ayat Kami, mereka itulah penghuni neraka
